Treats

Pad Thai Sauce

Notes

Simple Pad Thai Sauce

What's in it
  • 5 1/2 tbsps Brown Sugar
  • 5 tbsps Lime Juice
  • 2 tbsps Lemon Juice
  • 3 tbsps Worcestershire Sauce
  • 4 tbsps Soy Sauce
  • 2 tbsps Olive Oil
  • 1 tbsp Apple Cider Vinegar
  • 1 tsp Ginger powder
  • 1 tsp Tumeric powder
What to do
  • Mix together in bowl, emulsion blender is great if you have one.
